verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> or <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> Let <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> let his <S%H341>enemies<s%> be <S%H6327>scattered:<s%> let them also that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

As <S%H6227>smoke<s%> is <S%H5086>driven<s%> away, so <S%H5086>drive<s%> them away: as <S%H1749>wax<s%> <S%H4549>melts<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> so let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
But let the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> be <S%H8056>glad;<s%> let them <S%H5970>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God:<s%> yes, let them <S%H8057>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice.<s%>

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises to his <S%H8034>name:<s%> <S%H5549>extol<s%> him that <S%H7392>rides<s%> on the <S%H6160>heavens<s%> by his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3050>JAH,<s%> and <S%H5937>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.
A <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and a <S%H1781>judge<s%> of the <S%H490>widows,<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3427>sets<s%> the <S%H3173>solitary<s%> in <S%H1004>families:<s%> he <S%H3318>brings<s%> out those which are <S%H615>bound<s%> with <S%H3574>chains:<s%> but the <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in a <S%H6707>dry<s%> land.
O <S%H430>God,<s%> when you <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> when you did <S%H6805>march<s%> through the <S%H3452>wilderness;<s%> <S%H5542>Selah:<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>shook,<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H5197>dropped<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> even <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> <S%H2088>itself<s%> was moved at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
You, O <S%H430>God,<s%> did <S%H5130>send<s%> a <S%H5071>plentiful<s%> <S%H1653>rain,<s%> whereby you did <S%H3559>confirm<s%> your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> when it was <S%H3811>weary.<s%>
Your <S%H2416>congregation<s%> has <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> therein: you, O <S%H430>God,<s%> have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> of your <S%H2896>goodness<s%> for the <S%H6041>poor.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H562>word:<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> was the <S%H6635>company<s%> of those that <S%H1319>published<s%> it.
<S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H6635>armies<s%> did <S%H5074>flee<s%> apace: and she that <S%H5116>tarried<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>

<S%H518>Though<s%> you have <S%H7901>lien<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H8240>pots,<s%> yet shall you be as the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of a <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H2645>covered<s%> with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and her <S%H84>feathers<s%> with <S%H3422>yellow<s%> <S%H2742>gold.<s%>
When the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H6566>scattered<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> in it, it was white as <S%H7949>snow<s%> in <S%H6756>Salmon.<s%>
The <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is as the <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan;<s%> an <S%H1386>high<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%> as the <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H7520>leap<s%> you, you <S%H1386>high<s%> <S%H2022>hills?<s%> this is the <S%H2022>hill<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2530>desires<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in; <S%H637>yes,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in it for <S%H5331>ever.<s%>

The <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are <S%H7239>twenty<s%> <S%H7239>thousand,<s%> even <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H8136>angels:<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is among them, as in <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place.

You have <S%H5927>ascended<s%> on <S%H4791>high,<s%> you have led <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H7617>captive:<s%> you have <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H4979>gifts<s%> for <S%H120>men;<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> for the <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H637>also,<s%> that the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> might <S%H7931>dwell<s%> among them.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> who <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H6006>loads<s%> us with benefits, even the <S%H410>God<s%> of our <S%H3444>salvation.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
He that is our <S%H410>God<s%> is the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H4190>salvation;<s%> and to <S%H3069>GOD<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> belong the <S%H8444>issues<s%> from <S%H4194>death.<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H4272>wound<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and the <S%H1167>hairy<s%> <S%H8181><s%> <S%H6936>scalp<s%> of such an one as <S%H1980>goes<s%> on still in his <S%H817>trespasses.<s%>

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> my people <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea:<s%>
That your <S%H7272>foot<s%> may be <S%H4272>dipped<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of your <S%H3611>dogs<s%> in the same.
They have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H1979>goings,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> even the <S%H1979>goings<s%> of my <S%H410>God,<s%> my <S%H4428>King,<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

The <S%H7891>singers<s%> <S%H6923>went<s%> <S%H6924>before,<s%> the <S%H5059>players<s%> on instruments followed <S%H310>after;<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them were the <S%H5959>damsels<s%> playing with <S%H8608>tambourines.<s%>
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> you <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4721>congregations,<s%> even the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> from the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H8033>There<s%> is <S%H6810>little<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> with their <S%H7287>ruler,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and their <S%H7277>council,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>
Your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H5797>strength:<s%> <S%H5810>strengthen,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> that <S%H2098>which<s%> you have <S%H6466>worked<s%> for us.
Because of your <S%H1964>temple<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H2986>bring<s%> <S%H7862>presents<s%> to you.

<S%H1605>Rebuke<s%> the <S%H2416>company<s%> of <S%H7070>spearmen,<s%> the <S%H5712>multitude<s%> of the <S%H47>bulls,<s%> with the <S%H5695>calves<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> till every one <S%H7511>submit<s%> himself with <S%H7518>pieces<s%> of <S%H3701>silver:<s%> <S%H967>scatter<s%> you the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H7128>war.<s%>
<S%H2831>Princes<s%> shall <S%H857>come<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> shall <S%H7323>soon<s%> <S%H7323>stretch<s%> out her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> you <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> O <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises to the <S%H136>Lord;<s%> <S%H5542>Selah:<s%>

To him that <S%H7392>rides<s%> on the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> which were of <S%H6924>old;<s%> <S%H2005>see,<s%> he does <S%H5414>send<s%> out his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and that a <S%H5797>mighty<s%> <S%H6963>voice.<s%>
<S%H5414>Ascribe<s%> you <S%H5797>strength<s%> to <S%H430>God:<s%> his <S%H1346>excellency<s%> is <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and his <S%H5797>strength<s%> is in the <S%H7834>clouds.<s%>

O <S%H430>God,<s%> you are <S%H3372>terrible<s%> out of your <S%H4720>holy<s%> places: the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is he that <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H8592>power<s%> to his <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H430>God.<s%>
